mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Concerns the strong winds experienced in France which makes sailing difficult; walked ten miles in search of two shepherd dogs in a storm; came upon the body of man who had just committed suicide; waiting to disembark when the winds die down; Mr. Nathaniel Cutting accompanies Jefferson to Cowes.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1789 October 7, [Le] Havre, [France] to [William] Short, n.p.
